title: A Defense of an Argument made use of in a Letter to Mr Dodwell
sourceDesc: In 1706, Clarke published a [Letter to Mr Dodwell], in response to his [Epistolary Discourse](https://englishphilosophy.org/texts/dodwell/ed). Shortly after, Collins published a [Letter to the Learned Mr. Henry Dodwell], as a direct response to Clarke's criticisms. A series of public letters between Clarke and Collins followed over the next few years, furthering the debate. They were never published as a set, but it was thought convenient to reproduce them here in that fashion.
author: Samuel Clarke

blocks.content: £1 A Defense £1 Of an ARGUMENT made use of in a _Letter_ to Mr _Dodwell_, to prove the _Immateriality_ and _Natural Immortality_ of the SOUL.
